snippet: J.R. Smith shot 3 of 14 after missing the Knicks’ previous game while serving a suspension for elbowing the Celtics’ Jason Terry in Game 3.
abstract: New York Knicks shooting guard J R Smith returns to the court after serving a suspension for elbowing Boston Celtics guard Jason Terry in Game 3 of their first-round playoff series; Smith blames himself for team's loss in Game 5, having missed his first10 shots and finished 3 of 14, including a meaningless 3-pointer in the closing seconds.
lead_paragraph: J.R. Smith shot 3 of 14 after missing the Knicks’ previous game while serving a suspension for elbowing the Celtics’ Jason Terry in Game 3.

headline.seo: J.R. Smith Back on Court, but His Shots Are Off
headline.main: Smith Back on Court, but His Shots Are Off
headline.print_headline: Smith Back on Court, but His Shots Are Off
